title.native: ディー・グレイマン ハロー

description:
Despite the recent Akuma attack, the members of the Black Order are in high spirits as they set about moving to a new base. Immediately upon his arrival, however, Allen Walker is suddenly called by the Central Agency and has his arm forcefully sealed by the Order. He is then led to a surprising meeting with his master, General Cross Marian, who reveals staggering secrets surrounding the enigmatic 14th Noah.

A phantom thief incident, the arrival of a mysterious group of Exorcists, the death of an important comrade, and an all-out battle against the Noah Family—just what does this mean for Allen, Yuu Kanda, and the rest of the Order? This is but the beginning of a series of strange, seemingly unconnected events that lead to something far greater.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Steampunk
tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Exorcism
tags.description: Involving religious methods of vanquishing youkai, demons, or other supernatural entities.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

node.description:
[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/katsura_5600/) 

She was an assistant of the mangaka [Takeshi Obata](https://anilist.co/staff/96888/Obata-Takeshi).

He made his debut as director on the first short of omnibus production Kimagure Robot and was later the director of tv series Mahou Shoujo Tai Arusu and its ova sequel, as well as director of the Russian co-produced film First Squad.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Website](http://www.kaoru-wada.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoru_wadash) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/4zbQfESCpBlXi1XlpnlG95)

He is a Japanese music composer. Married to voice actress [Akiko Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/95749/Akiko-Nakagawa).

__[Website](http://www.ayanomashiro.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ma_shi_ron) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ayanomashiro)__

Mashiro Ayano pre-debuted in volume 17 of LisAni! (May 2014 issue) as Mashiro in "Wingless Diver," as well as volume 18 (August 2014 issue) in "Setsuna Chronicle (刹那クロニクル)." She major-debuted in singing _Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works_ (TV) OP "ideal white" in October 2014.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
**Nobuoki Kinoshita** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
Producer affiliated with [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/Aniplex), where she has worked since 2009.
